body:
Thanks! Yes, this is really a problem of `$LD_LIBRARY_PATH`. After I put the latest mkl, the error is gone. 

But one thing I'm curious about is why `source activate ` doesn't do this automatically? The above solution looks hacky to me. Maybe I should submit an issue to conda instead?

But anyway, thanks for the speculation!
